thread.section_title: Commodities Market News - Yahoo!7 Australia Finance
thread.title: Primero Mining reports 2Q loss

title: Primero Mining reports 2Q loss
text:
Wed, Aug 5, 2015, 11:29 PM AEST - Australia Markets closed Primero Mining reports 2Q loss Primero Mining reports second-quarter loss but tops expectations Associated Press â€“ 1 hour 1 minute ago Recommend PPP 2.57 
VANCOUVER, British Columbia (AP) _ Primero Mining Corp. (PPP) on Wednesday reported a second-quarter loss of $6.7 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier. 
The Vancouver, British Columbia-based company said it had a loss of 4 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 1 cent per share. 
The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for a loss of 2 cents per share. 
The precious metals producer posted revenue of $67.4 million in the period. 
The company's shares closed at $2.57. A year ago, they were trading at $7.59.
